puzzles.explanation: Attacking the king's side often leads to checkmate threats.
puzzles.hint: Attack the king on the right side of the board!

puzzles.explanation: With the right moves, you can force checkmate in just two turns.
puzzles.hint: You can checkmate in 2 moves. Think ahead!

puzzles.explanation: Sometimes giving up material leads to an even bigger gain!
puzzles.hint: Sometimes giving up a piece leads to something better!

puzzles.explanation: When one piece moves, it reveals an attack from another piece!
puzzles.hint: Moving one piece can reveal an attack from another!

puzzles.explanation: This is checkmate in one move - the enemy king has no escape!
puzzles.hint: Look for a move that checkmates the king!

puzzles.explanation: In the endgame, every move counts. Play precisely to win!
puzzles.hint: Force a defender to move away from its duty.

puzzles.explanation: Find the best move to win material or checkmate!
puzzles.hint: Think carefully about what your opponent cannot defend!

Beginner.description: Simple tactics perfect for learning the basics

Intermediate.description: Learn pins, skewers, and discovered attacks

Advanced.description: Master complex sacrifices and deep calculations

metadata.notation: solution moves are in UCI format (e.g., 'e2e4' means move from e2 to e4)
